[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@microsoft/rush-lib](./rush-lib.md) &gt; [ICustomTipInfo](./rush-lib.icustomtipinfo.md)

## ICustomTipInfo interface

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Metadata for a custom tip.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ICustomTipInfo 
```

## Remarks

This differs from the [ICustomTipItemJson](./rush-lib.icustomtipitemjson.md) interface in that these are not configurable by the user; it's the inherent state of a custom tip. For example, the custom tip for `ERR_PNPM_NO_MATCHING_VERSION` has a inherent severity of `Error`<></>, and a inherent match function that rush maintainer defines.
